name: Stargaze (Demo)
description:
Ascend to a higher existence. Accept reality.

A short visual novel made in Ren'Py, within the span of one month.

An eldritch horror mystery story about a small town plagued by frequent meteor strikes. They say anyone who touches a meteorite disappears without a trace.

When our narrator meets a strange girl obsessed with these meteories, her entire reality shatters before her.

This story takes about half an hour to play through.

Audio and UI are in development. Art and script are already completed, though!
